name: Playbook for Mitigating PowerShell Script Attack
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving a PowerShell script that compromised a system through phishing.

action--74bc9c1e-f18f-4a04-a97e-560c6cc1.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--74bc9c1e-f18f-4a04-a97e-560c6cc1.description: Terminate any active malicious PowerShell processes identified.

parallel--a340e4d1-c0ef-4c8c-a222-d2742a.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--a340e4d1-c0ef-4c8c-a222-d2742a.description: Execute mitigation steps in parallel to reduce compromise spread.

action--ffc2dbf9-c76d-41f0-90df-bbc9e87c.name: Block outbound connections to known malicious IPs
action--ffc2dbf9-c76d-41f0-90df-bbc9e87c.description: Block outbound traffic to known malicious IP addresses used by the attacker.

action--de4d38ac-1bf0-4ffb-a2ae-91e1ff62.name: Run malware scan on host
action--de4d38ac-1bf0-4ffb-a2ae-91e1ff62.description: Perform a scan to identify any malicious artifacts and quarantine them if found.

loop--4b7e9673-54d1-45b9-a3fc-3ab39689b9.name: Check for malware scan results
loop--4b7e9673-54d1-45b9-a3fc-3ab39689b9.description: Repeat the malware scan until it shows no threats are present.
